attributes.action: allow public access to all emails (and mail) sent to and from government politicians
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All electronic mail to and from local government politicians should be made in the public domain, open for everyone to read.
Opening this type of communication stream to the public in this manner can only strengthen our democratic and open society.
Other countries are moving towards this openness and the UK should follow suit also.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
